title: De Blasio Gets Schooled on Reopening
sub_head: He reopens some schools as public pressure beats the teachers union.
body:
Perhaps New York City parents didn’t know their own strength. In less than two weeks, Mayor Bill de Blasio went from shutting down in-person learning in the city’s public schools to reopening it for a large share of students. The reversal shows how public pressure can curb the power of the teachers union.
